articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wedding Spread to Couple of Miner and Disabled Soldier
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wedding Spread to Couple of Miner and Disabled Soldier
						
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, a tunneling worker of Ripsok Mine of Anju Area Coal Complex in South Phyongan Province, and Ri Ok Sim, a special class disabled soldier, received a wedding spread sent by dear respected Kim Jong Un Wednesday.
					 Kim Ki Nam, who has worked with devoted efforts for the increased production of coal, married Ri Ok Sim, who was injured during the performance of her military duty, to help her keep bringing into bloom the flower of the revolution, wearing the military uniform in her mind.
					
					 Kim Jong Un extended thanks to the miner for his praiseworthy deed and congratulated them on their marriage.
